## Description and Rationale

I am a senior Industrial Engineering students at Işık University with a strong interest in data science and aviation. I joined the PRC Data Challenge to apply machine learning techniques to real aviation data and contribute to improving fuel efficiency and sustainability in air transport.

## Details

* Type: Academia
* Country: Turkey

library(gt)
